intermol.tests.testing_tools module¶

intermol.tests.testing_tools.add_handler(directory)[source]¶

Adds two FileHandlers to the global logger object.

Parameters:directory – path to output directory of the conversion
Returns:logs all >=INFO-level messages to directory/INFO_LOG h2: logs all >=DEBUG-level messages to directory/DEBUG_LOG
also includes function and line number for each message
Return type:h1
intermol.tests.testing_tools.remove_handler(h1, h2)[source]¶

Removes the filehandlers h1, h2.

Discontiniues messages being logged to their respective files.

intermol.tests.testing_tools.summarize_results(input_type, results, outdir)[source]¶
intermol.tests.testing_tools.which(program)[source]¶
